title: Diabetes is WRECKING Your Sex Life!
content:
If you struggle with type 2 diabetes , you know just how difficult it is to manage .
You ’ re continually pricking your finger… policing everything you put in your mouth… and popping pills or giving yourself painful injections .
Even worse ?
This dreaded disease can drastically impact another area of your life… In fact , your diabetes might be turning off the heat in the bedroom .
Here ’ s how to stop it… before it ruins your sex life completely .
A study published in the American Journal of Human Genetics observed over 220,000 men pulled @ @ @ @ @ @ @ conditions .
Ultimately , they concluded that there is a distinct connection between type 2 diabetes and erectile dysfunction .
This isn ’ t surprising because type 2 diabetes can cause nerve damage and impairments with certain blood vessels .
And keeping things hopping in the bedroom is mainly about having enough blood flow .
So either of these issues can have a drastic impact on whether or not you ’ re able to “ rise to the occasion.
” Fortunately , there are steps you can take to ease your symptoms… and @ @ @ @ @ @ @ key is to manage your diabetes .
And that doesn ’ t mean popping some pill that ’ s packed with dangerous side effects .
Instead there are natural ways to get your blood sugar under control AND keep sex life on track : Get enough sleep : Poor sleep habits affect insulin sensitivity and hormones that play an important role in blood sugar control .
• None Cinnamon improves insulin sensitivity and also lowers blood sugar levels up to 29 % .
• None Studies show this Chinese herb lowers blood sugar @ @ @ @ @ @ @ supplement 3 times a day , once before each meal .
• None A study found that people with the highest magnesium intake had a 47 % lower chance of becoming diabetic .
Chromium is also involved in metabolism and helps control blood sugar levels .
Foods high in magnesium include whole grains , fish , and dark leafy greens .
Chromium-rich foods are high-bran cereals , coffee , nuts , broccoli and certain meats .
author: Susan White

id: allianceforadvancedhealth--2020-03-29--[BREAKING] You’re MISSING This Hidden COVID-19 Sign
title: [BREAKING] You’re MISSING This Hidden COVID-19 Sign
content:
It ’ s all over the news .
And it ’ s the ONLY thing anyone is talking about… Every time you turn around , the impact of this virus skyrockets higher and HIGHER .
But the best thing you can do for both you and your family is to be prepared and stay informed .
I ’ ll bet you already know the basics : wash your hands , don ’ t touch your face , stay home .
You also know that trouble breathing , fever , and chills mean you need to get to the doctor and @ @ @ @ @ @ @ told you there ’ s a HIDDEN symptom the mainstream isn ’ t talking about .
Chances are you ’ re MISSING one of the biggest signs of the coronavirus… Here ’ s what you need to know .
When it comes to coronavirus , follow your nose .
You see , researchers have just discovered that carriers of the coronavirus often experience one telltale symptom… Experts call it asnomia , or sometimes hyposmia , and it ’ s happening to coronavirus victims across the globe .
South Korea—one of the hardest-hit countries— @ @ @ @ @ @ @ this strange symptom .
They noticed it started appearing in over 30 % of coronavirus patients .
And now it ’ s showing up in thousands of patients , even in Italy and Iran .
But here ’ s the surprising part… it was the only symptom these patients had .
That ’ s right .
No coughing , no chest tightness .
They had NONE of the usual COVID-19 symptoms .
If you find you ’ ve suddenly lost your sense of smell , consult your healthcare provider as soon as possible @ @ @ @ @ @ @ research suggests you isolate yourself from your loved ones for at least one week .
Be sure to load up on immune-boosting supplements like vitamin C and elderberry .
While these won ’ t cure you , they can give your immune system the strength it will need to fight it .
Getting through this pandemic is NOT impossible .
But the first step is spotting the symptoms and taking the right measures .
author: Susan White

id: allianceforadvancedhealth--2020-03-28--COVID-19: What You NEED to Know about This Drug
title: COVID-19: What You NEED to Know about This Drug
content:
COVID-19 : What You NEED to Know about This Drug If you ’ re like most folks , you probably have a bottle of ibuprofen sitting in your medicine cabinet right now .
It may be great for aches and pains… but we ’ ve known for a while about how dangerous this drug can be .
Research has shown it could land you with side effects like hemorrhaging , vomiting and intestinal ulcers .
Or worse…it could put you at a higher risk of experiencing cardiovascular events and even can lead to a fatal stroke .
These alone are @ @ @ @ @ @ @ pills .
But shockingly new information shows ibuprofen may be more dangerous than originally thought… Especially when it comes to the new COVID-19 pandemic .
Recently the French government reported that “ grave adverse effects ” have been linked to patients affected with COVID-19 and the use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs ( NSAIDs ) like ibuprofen .
The French Health Minister , who is also a neurologist , stated that taking these types of drugs could further aggravate the infection .
And since they already come with a boatload of side effects and @ @ @ @ @ @ @ this means these drugs can ultimately weaken your body .
And that ’ s not something you want with COVID-19 spreading like wildfire .
While research on ibuprofen and the coronavirus is still underway , and scientists have not come to a definite conclusion , it may be best to air on the side of caution .
Acetaminophen may ultimately be the better bet here .
But if you typically take these types of drugs for pain relief , consider some natural alternatives .
Try cooking more with a natural anti-inflammatory like turmeric @ @ @ @ @ @ @ Using a lavender or peppermint essential oil in a diffuser can also provide relief .
Peppermint tea or ginger tea have also shown to help alleviate pain .
However , if you ’ re suffering with a fever or are experiencing any other COVID-19 symptoms be sure to drink plenty of water and consult a healthcare professional immediately .
author: Susan White

title: [SHOCKING] Heart Drugs GIVING You DIABETES?
content:
I ’ m willing to bet that whenever you have any kind of health issue your first instinct is to go to your doctor .
And when you go to your doctor and present this issue to him nine times out of ten he ’ s going to try and hand you a “ solution ” that comes in a bottle .
Pills .
The problem is , these prescription drugs often do more harm than good .
You see , while they might help your one issue…they ’ ll give you OTHER health problems .
So you need more @ @ @ @ @ @ @ problems !
That ’ s the nature of Big Pharma .
Because for them , more medicine equals more cash in their pocket .
Well , unfortunately Big Pharma is at it again .
A common class of heart drugs is sending your risk of getting diabetes through the ROOF .
A recent study led by The Ohio State University in Columbus looked at the health records of over 4,600 individuals who did NOT have diabetes at the start of the study .
But they did have a risk of heart disease .
@ @ @ @ @ @ @ prescription statins ( typically administered to lower cholesterol ) when the three-year study began .
At the end of the study , researchers found that folks taking statins were TWICE as likely to be diagnosed with type 2 diabetes than those not taking the drug .
Another study looked at 8,567 participants aged 64 and over for a total of 14 years .
They found that using statins was associated with a greater risk of high blood sugar AND insulin resistance .
If you ’ re taking statins , you may want to @ @ @ @ @ @ @ health that doesn ’ t send you on the fast track to diabetes .
There are easy diet changes you can make like adding in flaxseed ( or flaxseed oil ) , artichokes , Omega-3s like fish oil or salmon .
Probiotics either as a supplement or yogurt are also beneficial .
But you should never quit taking statins – or any medication – cold turkey .
Talk to your doctor about how to taper off these blood sugar-destroying drugs .
author: Susan White

id: allianceforadvancedhealth--2020-03-31--Sunshine Fruit REVERSES Diabetes and Heart Disease!
title: Sunshine Fruit REVERSES Diabetes and Heart Disease!
content:
Getting older comes with its ups and downs .
It has perks like getting to spend time with friends and family and watching the grandkids grow up .
But it also has some scary downsides when it comes to your health .
More candles on the cake means your risk for life–threatening diseases shoots upward .
And these can ultimately countdown the timer on the time you have left with your loved ones .
But there is some good news… You have control over how long you have left .
Because new research shows that this sunshine fruit can REVERSE @ @ @ @ @ @ @ disease and obesity .
Even better ?
It could even ERASE the damage already done .
A study published in the Journal of Lipid Research found that a unique molecule found in oranges and tangerines – called nobiletin – SHEILDS you against heart disease and diabetes .
And may also REVERSE obesity .
For part of this study , two groups of mice were given a fatty , high-cholesterol diet .

The group only on the fatty diet had a significant increase in @ @ @ @ @ @ @ also found that nobiletin reversed symptoms of heart disease in already obese mice .
